mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student ( name, no, gender, phone, id_card, is_college, address, degree, graduation_date, clazz_id, violation_count, violation_score, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{no}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{isCollege}, #{address}, #{degree}, #{graduationDate}, #{clazzId}, 0,0, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET violation_score = violation_score + #{score}, violation_count = violation_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
